attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: The AI Hype Index has been introduced to help differentiate between the genuine advancements in artificial intelligence and the exaggerated claims often associated with it.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: In a collaboration between the Financial Times and MIT Technology Review, 'The State of AI' discusses the implications of AI technologies like chatbots on privacy and society every week.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: John Jumper, a Nobel laureate at Google DeepMind, reflects on the future developments of AlphaFold, which has shifted focus from gaming to groundbreaking projects in science.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: These discussions highlight the dynamic nature of the AI field, balancing between real innovations and the surrounding hype, as well as the ethical considerations that arise from these technologies.
